abilities.name: Psi Blades
abilities.description: Templar Assassin's psi blade extends the range of her attack and enables her to spill damage to units behind the target.
abilities.notes: Spill damage is based on the damage dealt to the primary target after all reductions.

abilities.name: Meld
abilities.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still. Attacking to break invisibility will deal bonus damage and reduce the target's armor for a duration.
abilities.notes: The armor reduction effect lingers for the full duration even after the bonus damage is used.

abilities.name: Psionic Trap
abilities.description: Templar Assassin places a psionic trap that slows enemies when sprung. Traps are invisible and grant limited vision around them.
abilities.notes: Templar Assassin can have multiple traps active at once. Traps must be sprung manually using the Trap sub-ability.

abilities.name: Trap
abilities.description: Springs the nearest trap. Trapped enemies are slowed based on how long the trap has been active.
abilities.notes: The slow increases gradually as the trap charges up to its maximum value.

abilities.name: Self Trap
abilities.description: Teleport to a selected trap. Upon arrival, the trap is triggered and Templar Assassin gains bonus armor and damage for a short duration.
abilities.notes: Self Trap is only available when Templar Assassin has Aghanim's Scepter.

innate_abilities.name: Psionic Projection
innate_abilities.description: Templar Assassin's mastery of psionic energy grants her an innate ability to protect herself from harm.
innate_abilities.notes: Refraction absorbs both physical and magical damage instances while providing bonus damage on attacks.
